original_text: And the Philistines gathered themselves together, and came and pitched in Shunem: and Saul gathered all Israel together, and they pitched in Gilboa.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들이 모여 수넴에 이르러 진 치매 사울이 온 이스라엘을 모아 길보아에 진 쳤더니

sentences.original_text: And the Philistines gathered themselves together,
and came and pitched in Shunem:
and Saul gathered all Israel together,
